name: Reserving the State's authority to regulate, inspect, or ban the use of donated food
text: [§145D-5]  Reserving the State's authority to regulate, inspect, or ban the use of donated food.  Nothing in this chapter is intended to restrict the authority of the department of health or the department of agriculture to regulate, inspect, or ban the use of such donated foods for human consumption. [L 1982, c 260, pt of §2]
